record.field: Sales of goods and/or services invoiced in the domestic market, except sales taxed at Zero Rate
Export of goods and exempt operations
Non-taxable sales and operations not subject to VAT
Value attributed to goods and/or services withdrawn and personal consumption
Returns and cancellations made during the period
Discounts, bonuses, and reductions obtained during the period
Updated Fiscal Debit corresponding to Reimbursements
Updated Fiscal Debit corresponding to Reconciliations
Total Fiscal Debit of the period (C39+C55+C19)
Purchases corresponding to taxable and/or non-taxable activities
Purchases directly related to taxable activities
Purchases in which it is not possible to discriminate their linkage with taxable and non-taxable activities
Returns and cancellations received during the period
Discounts, bonuses, and reductions granted during the period
Tax credit for purchases related to taxable activities (C26 * 13%)
Updated Fiscal Credit corresponding to Reconciliations
Proportional Fiscal Credit corresponding to the taxable activity [C31*(C13+C14)/(C13+C14+C15+C505)]*13%
Total Fiscal Credit of the period (C114+C30+C1003)
Difference in favor of the Taxpayer (C1004-C1002; If > 0)
Difference in favor of the Treasury or Determined Tax (C1002-C1004; If > 0)
Fiscal Credit balance from the previous period to be offset (C592 from the previous period's form)
Updated value on the Fiscal Credit balance from the previous period
Determined Tax balance in favor of the Treasury (C909-C635-C648; If > 0)
Payment on account of 50% of employer contributions paid in the period (Based on Contributions Paid in the previous period); according to D.S. 4298 (Subject to verification by SIN)
Treasury balance in favor after offsetting payments on account for employer contributions (C1001 - C621; If > 0)((C621 - C1001; If > 0) = 0)
Payments on account made in Sworn Statements and/or Payment Slips corresponding to the declared period
Balance of Payments on account from the previous period to be offset (C747 from the previous period's form)
Balance for Payments on account in favor of the Taxpayer (C640+C622-C629; If > 0)
Treasury balance after offsetting payments on account (C629-C622-C640; If > 0)
5% Payment on account for purchases from SIETE-RG taxpayers; according to D.S. 4298
5% Payments on account balance for purchases from SIETE-RG taxpayers (C469 from the previous period)
Balance in favor after offsetting 5% payments on account for purchases from SIETE-RG taxpayers (C465+C466-C468; If > 0)
Fine for Non-compliance with Formal Duties (IDF) for late submission
IDF Fine for Increase in Determined Tax in Rectificatory Sworn Statements submitted late
Definitive balance of Fiscal Credit in favor of the Taxpayer for the next period (C693+C635+C648-C909; If > 0)
Definitive balance for 5% Payments on account in favor of the Taxpayer for purchases from SIETE-RG taxpayers for the next period (C467; If > 0)
Definitive balance for Payments on account in favor of the Taxpayer for the next period (C643-C955; If > 0)
Definitive Treasury balance in favor (C996; If > 0)
Definitive Treasury balance in favor (C955-C643; If > 0)
Payment in securities (Subject to verification and confirmation by SIN)
Payment with Balance in Favor - FAP (Subject to verification and confirmation by SIN)
